== Cherukunnu (CT) (627225) ==

Cherukunnu (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 15.33 sq. km. and harbouring 3418 households with total population of 16111 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 16 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 531 km. Male population is 7153 and female population is 8958. Scheduled Caste population is 1158 and Scheduled Tribes population is 40. Census Location Code of the town is 627225<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 43 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 110 km. Railway station is at Kannapuram at a distance of 1 km.
